Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is popular amongst other fuel cell technologies due to fuel flexibility, low cost, and stability.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Because of difficulties involved in the handling of hydrogen, onsite hydrogen production is considered for many small- and large-scale applications.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It involves an integrated setup consisting of a reformer, combustor, and fuel cell stack.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Being operated at high temperature, gases leaving SOFC contain a significant amount of thermal energy which can be utilized within the integrated reforming process.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In addition, anode-off-gas (AOG) from SOFC contains unreacted hydrogen which can be utilized as fuel in an integrated combustor thereby increasing combustor efficiency.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: For effective integration of a combustor, reformer, and power generator, modeling and simulation is of great utility.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the present work, a 3D model of an integrated combustor unit is developed and implemented into the computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulation package ANSYS FLUENT (R).
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Main objective of this work is to prove the concept of enhancement in combustor performance by utilizing AOG from SOFC as a supplementary fuel in the combustor.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Simulation results show a significant increase in combustor temperature and heat dissipated to the reformer side with AOG utilization.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Up to an 18% saving in fuel (natural gas), used in combustor to supply heat to the reformer, is observed.
Titulo: Combustion Modeling and Simulation of Recycled Anode-off-Gas from Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
